channel.title: Blogs on Robot Learning
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Robot Learning

item.title: robots
item.description: Robots can be complex. Complexity arises from the large dimensional states and inputs that a robot can have. The lack of a good model to map inputs to outputs and also to completing tasks. The Darpa Robotics Challenge(DRC) is an example of the hurdles in achieving human-like performance in robots. Robots outperform humans in model based environments. Achieving this precision in the real world riddled with model uncertainties requires exploration into machine learning.
